### Methods

#### IsObsolete

Determines if the given type is decorated as being obsolete

```csharp
public static bool IsObsolete(this Type type)
```

**Parameters**

| Parameter | Description |
| --- | --- |
| type | The Type to check |

**Returns**

True if the type is obsolete, otherwise False
